column4: Hi could anyone help me with a problem regarding locale and an Ubuntu mini on a server? I got error messages like the ones you can see at http://forum.ubuntuusers.de/topic/seltsame-fehlermeldungen-betr.-locale/ in the grey field
I get errors like "/usr/bin/mandb: can't set the locale; make sure $LC_* and $LANG are correct" etc. all the time
and "locale" wasn't installed before by the way (sorry this isn't everything in a line)
